documents.document: @SaraHusani Hi Gorgeous! Thank you for everything that you do. You are such an inspiration to all of us. Know that we appreciate you so much I'm so happy to hear about your great experience with our foundation Take care and stay safe my love!

@VariJStylez Spill that tea honey! You're fire
@SHO_Shameless LOVE HER!!!! She's the cutest!!!

@superflydave Hi, can you send us your email address so the team can get in touch xx
@Billu_sahab Hi darling, the team have been in touch via email, can you check your mail/junk and let us know if you haven't received anything so they can assist you, they will send a follow up now x
@ClairePimf Hi Claire, this doesnt seem like an order number from our official site, can you email our team at shop@hudabeauty.com so they can assist you xx
@Lol_Gambit Hi darling, can you send me your email address so we can look into this for you xx
@zainab96134472 Hi my love! Thank you for purchasing! I'm sorry to hear that. Can you send me your email address so we can look into this for you x
@BambiieeLou Hi darling! Hope you're amazing :) I'm sorry to hear that! Can you send me your email address so we can look into this for you x
@thatpharmartist @Dimmaumeh @lhidhiastanley Awwwww you're too CUTE!!! Love you so much!! We would love to send you one my love! Whats your IG handle? Will DM you for your details
@vanessaracquel_ Hi beautiful! You're SOO adorable! We would love to send you one my love! Whats your IG handle? Will DM you for your details Love you!!

@RazaCheemA300 Hi darling, this is just a value for customs purposes, I dont believe you would have been charged at checkout but if you can DM me your email address the team will be in touch to confirm x
@hafeezaxo Hi darling, Unfortunately this is not our authorized retailer, our legal team are aware of this site and working hard to resolve this!x
@vscott391outlo1 We'll look into this for you straight away. Can you DM us your email address so we can get in touch? x
@Msloud7 Hi darling, the team have been in touch about your Desert Dusk palette via email. Just let them know if you need anything else x
@fahimtahir16 Hi darling, hope all is well. Thank you so much for purchasing from us! So sorry to hear that, please email us at shop@hudabeauty.com so we can help you! Xx

@yoshitagrawal @MyNykaa Hi beautiful! Hope you're safe! Thank you so much for purchasing our products. I'm so sorry to hear that you may have had a reaction, can you send us your email address so our team can get in touch with you and look into this further x
